詜字的基本解释

詜
tāo
〔詜??（
t俹 ）〕言不节。

詜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tāo］
［《廣韻》土刀切，平豪，透。］
(1)言语不节制。
(2)往来言。
(3)小儿语不正。

詜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1156第06
【廣韻】土刀切【集韻】他刀切，?音叨。【玉篇】詜䛬，言不節也。【類篇】往來言也。一曰小兒語不正也。　【篇海】譌作〈言?〉。

詜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
詜字的起名意思

暂无。

t 俹)] The words are not good.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tāo］
["Guangyun" soil knife cut, Pinghao, thorough. ]
(1) Intemperance in speech.
(2) Dialogues.
(3) Children's speech is not correct.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　詜; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1156 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Earth knife cuts [Ji Yun] He cuts with knife,? [Jade articles] You are not good at words. 【Classes】Talks also. One said that children’s language is not correct.　【Pianhai】Zhao Zuo "yan?".
